faqs.answer_english: Your policy is currently active and will expire on December 31, 2026.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aapki policy abhi active hai aur 31 December 2026 ko expire hogi.

questions: How do I file a claim?
faqs.answer_english: To file a claim, please call our helpline at 1800-XXX-XXXX or visit our website.
faqs.answer_hindi: Claim file karne ke liye, humari helpline par call karein ya website visit karein.

faqs.answer_english: Your current premium is 5000 rupees per month.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aapka current premium 5000 rupees per month hai.

faqs.answer_english: Your next payment is due on February 15, 2026.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aapka next payment 15 February 2026 ko due hai.

questions: How do I update my details?
faqs.answer_english: You can update your details by logging into your account.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aap apni details account mein login karke update kar sakte hain.

questions: What is covered in my policy?
faqs.answer_english: Your policy covers hospitalization and surgery up to 10 lakh rupees.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aapki policy mein hospitalization aur surgery 10 lakh tak cover hai.

faqs.answer_english: Yes, you can cancel your policy. Please contact our support team.
faqs.answer_hindi: Haan, aap policy cancel kar sakte hain. Support team se contact karein.

faqs.answer_english: Your policy document is available in your registered email.
faqs.answer_hindi: Aapka policy document email mein hai.

faqs.answer_english: I'll resend the OTP to your registered mobile number.
faqs.answer_hindi: Main OTP phir se bhej raha hoon.

faqs.answer_english: I'll connect you to our customer service representative.
faqs.answer_hindi: Main aapko customer service se connect kar raha hoon.
